title: Title
logInBody: Logging into your MAL, Kitsu, or AniList account will allow you to view and update your anime list.
deleteModalBody: Continuing will permanently delete %s from your anime list.
chooseProvider: Choose your anime list provider below.
autoUpdateList: Automatically update my anime list after watching an episode.
askBeforeAdding: Ask before adding a new series
newEpisodeNotification: Send a notification when a new epsiode is released for a current series
logInAfter: After, you will be returned to Ashidori. Your password will not be saved.
episodeCompletedPopupBody: Looks like you've finished watching episode %d of %s. Should we update your progress on %s's anime list?
episodeCompletedPopupClickBody: Looks like you've finished watching episode %d of %s. Click on this notification to update %s's anime list.
newAnimeEpisodeCompletedPopupBody: Looks like you've finished watching episode %d of %s. Should we add the show to %s's anime list?
newAnimeEpisodeCompletedPopupClickBody: Looks like you've finished watching episode %d of %s. Click on this notification to add the show to %s's anime list.
episodeRevertedPopupBody: The change to %s has been reverted.
episodeUpdatedCurrentBody: %s has been marked as currently watching.
episodeUpdatedNewBody: %s has been added to your anime list.
currentlyWatchingTip: You are currently watching episode %d of %s.
errorOccurredBody: Please check your internet connection and try again.
errorOccurredOnUpdateBody: The series progress was unable to be updated automatically.
